Log: Wed Feb 13 09:05:51 CST 2002

The problem seems to be in the binary project decorator. Turn it off from 
the 'Window->Decorators' menu and see if that helps.

I know what is the problem - for some reason, the UI returns low icon depth for 
your particular display so PDE switches to the basic icon set. Two overlay 
icons are missing in 20020212 from the basic set. 

A quick fix (this will also be done in the future builds):

1) go into org.eclipse.pde/icons/full/ovr16
2) Copy binary_co.gif and external_co.gif 
3) Paste these icons into org.eclipse.pde/icons/basic/ovr16

Turning off the decorator does remove the problem.
As well, my display does always seem to require the "basic" icon set.

I know that the JDT and Debug and JDT Debug have removed basic icon 
support...not sure if this is on your plan.
It would definitely make our life easier :-).

I am getting a similar (same?) problem on 20020214.
Stack trace looks identical.
